languages.text: {n}Лицо Астарции краснеет, она с трудом подавляет в груди яростный крик.{/n} "Гроксово отродье! Я не удивлюсь, если это была не ошибка, а умышленный саботаж с самого начала..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Астарции краснеет, она с трудом подавляет в груди яростный крик.{/n} "Демоново отродье! Я не удивлюсь, если это была не ошибка, а умышленный саботаж с самого начала..."
traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}Astartia's face turns red, and she can barely contain the enraged cry inside her chest.{/n} "That grox spawn! I wouldn't be surprised if this was no mistake but a deliberate act of sabotage from the off..."

traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}アスタルチアの顔が赤くなり、怒りの余り叫び出したいのをどうにか胸にとどめている。{/n}「蜥蜴牛め！これが最初から、ミスではなく意図的な妨害工作だったなら、驚きもしません…」
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia's face turns red, and she can barely contain the enraged cry inside her chest.{/n} "That grox spawn! I wouldn't be surprised if this was no mistake but a deliberate act of sabotage from the off..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アスタルチアの顔が赤くなり、怒りの余り叫び出したいのをどうにか胸にとどめている。{/n}「蜥蜴牛め！これが最初から、ミスではなく意図的な妨害工作だったなら、驚きもしません…」
traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}艾丝塔西娅气得脸色通红，几乎要哭出来了。{/n}“那个格洛克斯杂种！别说什么无心之失，就算他们真是蓄意陷害，我也一点儿都不惊讶……”
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia's face turns red, and she can barely contain the enraged cry inside her chest.{/n} "That grox spawn! I wouldn't be surprised if this was no mistake but a deliberate act of sabotage from the off..."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾丝塔西娅气得脸色通红，几乎要哭出来了。{/n}“格洛克斯臭杂种！别说什么无心之失，就算他们真是蓄意陷害，我也一点儿都不惊讶……”
traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}Astartia devient écarlate et s'écrie avec rage :{/n} « Ce fils de grox ! Une erreur ? Je n'y crois pas une seconde ! C'était sûrement un acte de sabotage volontaire... »
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia's face turns red, and she can barely contain the enraged cry inside her chest.{/n} "That grox spawn! I wouldn't be surprised if this was no mistake but a deliberate act of sabotage from the off..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Astartia devient écarlate, et s'écrie avec rage :{/n} « Ce fils de grox ! Une erreur ? Je n'y crois pas une seconde ! C'était sûrement un acte de sabotage volontaire... »
traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}La cara de Astartia se vuelve roja; apenas puede contener su rabia.{/n} «¡Hijo de grox! No me sorprendería que esto no fuera un error, sino un acto deliberado de sabotaje desde el principio...».
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia's face turns red, and she can barely contain the enraged cry inside her chest.{/n} "That grox spawn! I wouldn't be surprised if this was no mistake but a deliberate act of sabotage from the off..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Astartia se vuelve roja, apenas puede contener su rabia.{/n} «No me sorprendería que esto no fuera un error, sino un acto deliberado de sabotaje desde el principio».
traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}Astartias Gesicht färbt sich rot und sie kann nur mit Mühe einen zornigen Schrei unterdrücken.{/n} "Diese Grox-Brut! Es würde mich nicht wundern, wenn das von Anfang an ein bewusster Sabotageakt war ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia's face turns red, and she can barely contain the enraged cry inside her chest.{/n} "That grox spawn! I wouldn't be surprised if this was no mistake but a deliberate act of sabotage from the off..."

traits.speaker: AstartiaVerserian

languages.text: {n}Yüzü kızaran Astartia, göğsünden yükselen öfkeli çığlığa zar zor hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Adi groks dölü! Bu iş hata değil de baştan sona kasten yapılmış bir baltalama çıkarsa hiç şaşmam..."
